/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street, lined with lush green trees and bushes, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on either side. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The image is captured from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
